name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior PHP Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, focused on creating high-performance applications while utilizing **PHP**, **C#**, **.NET Core**, and **Docker**. Proficient in designing and implementing **RESTful APIs** and adhering to current **web security** standards, I ensure robust and secure code through **OOP**, **SOLID** principles, and **Clean Code** practices. My background also includes developing enterprise-level solutions with a solid understanding of **design patterns** and secure coding practices.

In addition to my development skills, I have extensive experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, contributing to projects in the healthcare and financial sectors. I have successfully led the deployment of scalable platforms, implementing CI/CD automation within **microservices architecture** and **event-driven systems**, while leveraging cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. Familiar with machine learning workflows and MLOps tools, I have also integrated advanced analytics capabilities into applications.
